subject: Re: Flock camera
body:
Thank you sir, this is a big help.  I have sent your information to Flock and they will reach out and make sure they can comply with your request before installing. I have CC�d Matt so he has your Information and requirements for install.  

Matt, can you work with Toby on photos and whatever else he needs?

Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
Work Celll � 541-743-6192
________________________________

From: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 14:16
To: JOHNS Aaron R <AJohns@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: RE: Flock camera
 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Aaron,

 

I can confirm that those poles in that area are Lumen owned.  I approve installation of camera(s) on the pole and in very much in favor of this. 

 

That being said, we do need to make sure we are in compliance with NESC standards.  (i.e. unobstructed climbing space, and because this pole has power attached the camera needs to be properly bonded and grounded to the poles ground wire etc.)  I am sure Flock is aware of these things and has experience with it.

 

I would like to see an example of a camera installed on a pole if you have any photo examples or can point me toward a current installation site?

 

 

 



Toby Rasmussen

Manager Region Operations

Outstate Oregon

Phone: 509-222-8018

tobin.rasmussen tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com @lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com 

 

 

 

 

From: JOHNS Aaron R <AJohns@eugene-or.gov>
Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 12:22 PM
To: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com>
Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Flock camera

 

Toby, I am writing this email to confirm we can get a Flock camera attached to the Lumen pole located between 3045 Royal Ave and 3115 Royal Ave. I believe these Flock cameras can be a great asset in catching wire thieves. Ensurity is also making

Toby,

I am writing this email to confirm we can get a Flock camera attached to the Lumen pole located between 3045 Royal Ave and 3115 Royal Ave.  I believe these Flock cameras can be a great asset in catching wire thieves.  Ensurity is also making a program that will work directly with Flock�s cameras.  Flock cameras will be able to track the GPS signal from Ensurity�s trackers and capture digital images as the trackers move around the area of the Flock cameras. 

 

Sincerely,

 

Aaron Johns

Detective

Property Crimes Unit

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Rd

Eugene OR 97401

Ph 541-682-5843

Fax 541-682-6603

 

 



 

________________________________

If you have received this communication in error, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the communication and any attachments.
